data.title: Curry College
data.text:
Full-time students who carry 12 or more graded credits in the Fall or Spring semester, earn at least a 3.30 semester GPA, and have no grade lower than a "C" and no incompletes in the semester qualify for the Dean's List.

Part-time students must be matriculated, carry 6 - 11.5 grade credits in the Fall or Spring semester, earn a cumulative total of 15 graded credits at the College in consecutive semesters as a part-time student, earn at least a 3.30 semester GPA, and have no grade lower than a "C" and no incompletes in the semester in order to qualify for the Dean's List.

Note: Dean's List is computed for the standard academic year, which includes the Fall and Spring semesters only. Once established for a given semester, Dean's List eligibility is not recomputed.
